author: SubflyDev
text:
Your free bookmark manager just got a huge update!
Hey everyone

About 3 months ago, I released [YABA (Yet Another Bookmark App)](https://apps.apple.com/app/yaba-yet-another-bookmark-app/id6747272081) â€” a bookmarking app thatâ€™s:  
\- 100% free â€” no ads, no subscriptions, no payments, ever  
\- 100% open-source â€” you can check everything yourself  
\- 100% privacy-friendly â€” no tracking, no data collection, no analytics  
\- Fully native â€” designed to feel at home on Apple platforms

Since then, YABA has been downloaded **over 2,000 times** ğŸ‰. Iâ€™m beyond grateful for everyone whoâ€™s tried it, shared feedback, and supported this project â€” youâ€™re the reason it keeps getting better ğŸ’™.

Hereâ€™s a quick look at whatâ€™s happened since v1.0:

**v1.2** â€” Dark app icon, announcements tab, â€œrecentsâ€ toggle for home screen, CloudKit stability, import/export fixes.  
  
**v1.3** â€” Backlink/tracker remover, Markdown export, quick delete in creation sheet, and the last release with iCloud sync.

And now, the biggest update yet:

**v1.4 Highlights**

* **Keyboard Extension (iOS & iPadOS)** â€” access bookmarks instantly from any app.
* **Widgets (all platforms)** â€” pin folders/tags or view your most recent bookmarks at a glance.
* **Control Center Shortcut** â€” launch YABA in seconds, even from the lock screen.
* **All-New Sync** â€” iCloud is out! YABA now has its own private, independent sync system. Connect devices on the same network and sync in a few taps â€” no servers, no accounts.
* **Liquid Glass Design** â€” a modern refresh across platforms.
* **How-To Guide** â€” built-in instructions for getting started.
* **Customizable Create Button (iOS)** â€” adjust the floating button to fit your workflow.

Plus: smoother editing, import/export reliability, and lots of polish across macOS, iOS, and iPadOS.

**Whatâ€™s next**

* Folder-in-folder support
* Drag & drop reorganization
* Custom folder/tag ordering
* A reworked macOS menu bar
* Safari extension
* Android + Windows/Linux apps ğŸ‰

If youâ€™re looking for a bookmarking app thatâ€™s free, open-source, private, and actually nice to use â€” give YABA a try:

App Store: [https://apps.apple.com/app/yaba-yet-another-bookmark-app/id6747272081](https://apps.apple.com/app/yaba-yet-another-bookmark-app/id6747272081)

GitHub: [https://github.com/Subfly/YABA](https://github.com/Subfly/YABA)

Thanks again to everyone who downloaded YABA, sent feedback, or just cheered me on. Hereâ€™s to the next 2,000! ğŸš€

Happy bookmarking ğŸ“š
